about_the_game:
The game is a linear visual novel. It has a few choices, but they do not have an impact on the ending, instead they provide different content to the reader.
This is a continuation of Chapter 3. It is highly recommended to play through the other chapters first, before starting this one.

Join Folken as he starts his first adventure in a world that is reigned by magic.
Dive into the complex world of this fantasy story and discover creatures, lore, abilities and a lot of characters with unique personalities.

There are 45 CG's to unlock.
A single playthrough takes about 5-8 hours.

Story

After having survived the Trial, Folken is finally reunited with Meta.
What will their next move be?

There are only a few choices that can be made, and some paths to choose from. The decisions do not have an impact on the ending, instead they provide slightly different content.
